com.coveo.spillway.storage

Class AsyncLimitUsageStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coveo.spillway.storage.AsyncLimitUsageStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LimitUsageStorage

    public class AsyncLimitUsageStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements LimitUsageStorage
    An asynchronous implementation of LimitUsageStorage.

    This storage internally uses a InMemoryStorage as cache and performs asynchronous calls to the distributed storage to share information.

    This it particularly useful when using a database over the network as the queries are not slowed down by any external problems.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Guillaume Simard
